      • castSpellWeavingSpell

        void castSpellWeavingSpell()
        Cast the currently set up spell weaving spell. Spell cast, cost, difficulty, etc are determined by the spell the player has created with their current pylons. Pylons should be destroyed at this time, and checks should be made to player mana, skill level, etc
